metadata.title: CVE-2024-36954 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:tipc: fix a possible memleak in tipc_buf_append__skb_linearize() doesn't free the skb when it fails, so move'*buf = NULL' after __skb_linearize(), so that the skb can befreed on the err path.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
